job_description: software engineering job for the role MHorton Conversion

• Engineer/ Senior Engineer, Product Engineering, Media Health Reliability Coding, HIG-HBMSingapore, SingaporePosted 3 months ago Senior/Principal Engineer, HIG-HBM Product Engineering (Media Health Reliability)Singapore, SingaporePosted 5 months ago Characterize or model backend test, internal qualification, and RMA fail signatures Bachelor's in electrical engineering computer engineering, Physics, or Chemistry Demonstrated knowledge of semiconductor device physics including VLSI design 2 to 5 years of demonstrated experience Yield and fault analysis Experience performing Fault Isolation and Failure Analysis Computer aided layout and schematic experience Experience in reliability and quality analysis Masters in EE or Material Science.

• Coordinating design and development activities, including user experience, software design, solution deployment, and integration.
• Engaging with customers and partners to assess needs and develop innovative, practical solutions for Model-Based Systems Engineering and SysML requirements.
• Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
• Experience developing software integrations with mission engineering tools (such as Ansys STK, AFSIM) or Ansys software tools.
• Experience with version control systems and Agile development methodologies.
• Hands-on experience with Ansys STK Behavior Execution Engine and Cameo SysML state machines.
• Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate across distributed teams.
• Contributing to project-level planning, architecture, and software development for mission-critical simulation solutions.

• Investigating and resolving complex technical issues discovered by QA or product support, ensuring a robust and reliable user experience.
• Improving the user experience and confidence in STK through timely resolution of issues and proactive product improvements.
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field with 2+ years of experience, or a Master’s degree.
• Strong proficiency in C++ and experience with Visual Studio development environments.
• Experience with the commercial software development lifecycle, including design, implementation, testing, and documentation.
• Simulation experience, particularly in aerospace and defense applications, is highly desirable.
• Proactive in seeking feedback and continuously improving both technical and interpersonal skills.
• Contributing as a core member of the capability development team, designing, developing, testing, and documenting new features for the STK software platform.

• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
• You will use your experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to meet software engineering requirements.
